lead_paragraph: Pepe and Raul Meireles scored second-half goals to give Portugal a 2-0 win over Turkey in Group A of the European Championship in Geneva. In Basel, Vaclav Sverkos made his first goal for the Czech Republic a memorable one, scoring in a 1-0 victory over co-host Switzerland.
